title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 53.6 - Pilot vessel signals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 53.6 - Pilot vessel signals

State Regulations

Pilot vessels cruising or anchored on station and launches
servicing vessels from shore stations shall display such lights or day shapes
as may be required by the applicable rules of the road. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
53.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
